title: How to Install a K&N Air Intake on 2014 Ford Fiesta ST
description: Follow these step-by-step instructions to install your K&N Air Intake (part # K&N 63-2587) on a 2014 Ford Fiesta.
tags: K&N Intake, Ford Fiesta, K&N Intake

asset.title: 2014 Ford Fiesta ST Models with a 1.6L Turbo Engine K&N Air Intake Installation
asset.description:
See how easy it is to add more performance to your car with this air intake system.

This intake system created an estimated gain of 7.21 horsepower at 5,210 RPM and 10.07 lb. ft. of torque at 3,959 RPM when tested on the K&N dynamometer. 

http://www.knfilters.com/search/product.aspx?prod=63-2587

The K&N 63-2587 performance air intake system was designed for 2014 Ford Fiesta ST models with a 1.6L turbo engine.

http://www.knfilters.com
asset.author: KNfilters
